verses.verse: Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> a great <S%H7229><s%> feast <S%H3900><s%> to a thousand <S%H506><s%> of his lords, <S%H7261><s%> and drank <S%H8355><s%> wine <S%H2562><s%> before <S%H6903><s%> the thousand. <S%H506><s%>

Belshazzar, <S%H1113><s%> while he tasted <S%H2942><s%> the wine, <S%H2562><s%> commanded <S%H560><s%> to bring <S%H858><s%> the golden <S%H1722><s%> and silver <S%H3702><s%> vessels <S%H3984><s%> which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> his father <S%H2><s%> had taken <S%H5312><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the temple <S%H1965><s%> which was in Jerusalem; <S%H3390><s%> that the king <S%H4430><s%> and his lords, <S%H7261><s%> his wives <S%H7695><s%> and his concubines, <S%H3904><s%> might drink from them. <S%H8355><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> they brought <S%H858><s%> the golden <S%H1722><s%> vessels <S%H3984><s%> that were taken <S%H5312><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the temple <S%H1965><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> which was at Jerusalem; <S%H3390><s%> and the king <S%H4430><s%> and his lords, <S%H7261><s%> his wives <S%H7695><s%> and his concubines, <S%H3904><s%> drank from them. <S%H8355><s%>

They drank <S%H8355><s%> wine, <S%H2562><s%> and praised <S%H7624><s%> the gods <S%H426><s%> of gold, <S%H1722><s%> and of silver, <S%H3702><s%> of brass, <S%H5174><s%> of iron, <S%H6523><s%> of wood, <S%H636><s%> and of stone. <S%H69><s%>

In the same hour <S%H8160><s%> came forth <S%H5312><s%> the fingers <S%H677><s%> of a man <S%H606><s%>'s hand, <S%H3028><s%> and wrote <S%H3790><s%> over against <S%H6903><s%> the lampstand <S%H5043><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> the plaster <S%H1528><s%> of the wall <S%H3797><s%> of the king <S%H4430><s%>'s palace: <S%H1965><s%> and the king <S%H4430><s%> saw <S%H2370><s%> the part <S%H6447><s%> of the hand <S%H3028><s%> that wrote. <S%H3790><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s face <S%H2122><s%> was changed <S%H8133><s%> in him, <S%H7476><s%> and his thoughts troubled <S%H927><s%> him; <S%H7001><s%> and the joints of his thighs <S%H2783><s%> were loosened, <S%H8271><s%> and his knees <S%H755><s%> struck <S%H5368><s%> one <S%H1668><s%> against another. <S%H1668><s%>

The king <S%H4430><s%> cried <S%H7123><s%> aloud <S%H2429><s%> to bring <S%H5954><s%> in the enchanters, <S%H826><s%> the Chaldeans, <S%H3779><s%> and the soothsayers. <S%H1505><s%> The king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to the wise <S%H2445><s%> men of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> Whoever <S%H606><s%> shall read <S%H7123><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> writing, <S%H3792><s%> and show <S%H2324><s%> me its interpretation, <S%H6591><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3848><s%> with purple, <S%H711><s%> and have a chain <S%H2002><s%> of gold <S%H1722><s%> about <S%H5922><s%> his neck, <S%H6676><s%> and shall be the third <S%H8523><s%> ruler <S%H7981><s%> in the kingdom. <S%H4437><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H5954><s%> in all <S%H3606><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%>'s wise <S%H2445><s%> men; <S%H3546><s%> but they could not <S%H3809><s%> read <S%H7123><s%> the writing, <S%H3792><s%> nor make known <S%H3046><s%> to the king <S%H4430><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was king <S%H4430><s%> Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> greatly <S%H7690><s%> troubled, <S%H927><s%> and his face <S%H2122><s%> was changed <S%H8133><s%> in him, <S%H5922><s%> and his lords <S%H7261><s%> were perplexed. <S%H7672><s%>

Now the queen <S%H4433><s%> by reason <S%H6903><s%> of the words <S%H4406><s%> of the king <S%H4430><s%> and his lords <S%H7261><s%> came <S%H5954><s%> into the banquet <S%H4961><s%> house: <S%H1005><s%> the queen <S%H4433><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> O king, <S%H4430><s%> live <S%H2418><s%> forever; <S%H5957><s%> don't <S%H409><s%> let your thoughts <S%H7476><s%> trouble <S%H927><s%> you, <S%H2122><s%> nor let your face be changed. <S%H8133><s%>

There is <S%H383><s%> a man <S%H1400><s%> in your kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> in whom is the spirit <S%H7308><s%> of the holy <S%H6922><s%> gods; <S%H426><s%> and in the days <S%H3118><s%> of your father <S%H2><s%> light <S%H5094><s%> and understanding <S%H7924><s%> and wisdom, <S%H2452><s%> like the wisdom <S%H2452><s%> of the gods, <S%H426><s%> were found <S%H7912><s%> in him; <S%H4430><s%> and the king Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> your father, <S%H2><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> I say, <S%H2><s%> your father, made <S%H6966><s%> him master <S%H7229><s%> of the magicians, <S%H2749><s%> enchanters, <S%H826><s%> Chaldeans, <S%H3779><s%> and soothsayers; <S%H1505><s%>

because <S%H6903><s%> an excellent <S%H3493><s%> spirit, <S%H7308><s%> and knowledge, <S%H4486><s%> and understanding, <S%H7924><s%> interpreting <S%H6590><s%> of dreams, <S%H2493><s%> and showing <S%H263><s%> of dark sentences, <S%H280><s%> and dissolving <S%H8271><s%> of doubts, <S%H7001><s%> were found <S%H7912><s%> in the same Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> whom the king <S%H4430><s%> named <S%H7761><s%> Belteshazzar. <S%H1096><s%> Now <S%H3705><s%> let Daniel <S%H1841><s%> be called, <S%H7123><s%> and he will show <S%H2324><s%> the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was Daniel <S%H1841><s%> brought in <S%H5954><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king. <S%H4430><s%> The king <S%H4430><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> Are you <S%H607><s%> that Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> who are of <S%H4481><s%> the children <S%H1123><s%> of the captivity <S%H1547><s%> of Judah, <S%H3061><s%> whom the king <S%H4430><s%> my father <S%H2><s%> brought <S%H858><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> Judah? <S%H3061><s%>

I have heard <S%H8086><s%> of you, <S%H7308><s%> that the spirit of the gods <S%H426><s%> is in you, <S%H5922><s%> and that light <S%H5094><s%> and understanding <S%H7924><s%> and excellent <S%H3493><s%> wisdom <S%H2452><s%> are found in you. <S%H7912><s%>

Now <S%H3705><s%> the wise <S%H2445><s%> men, <S%H826><s%> the enchanters, have been brought <S%H5954><s%> in before <S%H6925><s%> me, <S%H7123><s%> that they should read this <S%H1836><s%> writing, <S%H3792><s%> and make known <S%H3046><s%> to me its interpretation; <S%H6591><s%> but they could <S%H3546><s%> not <S%H3809><s%> show <S%H2324><s%> the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the thing. <S%H4406><s%>

But I <S%H576><s%> have heard <S%H8086><s%> of you, <S%H5922><s%> that you can <S%H3202><s%> give <S%H6590><s%> interpretations, <S%H6591><s%> and dissolve <S%H8271><s%> doubts; <S%H7001><s%> now <S%H3705><s%> if <S%H2006><s%> you can <S%H3202><s%> read <S%H7123><s%> the writing, <S%H3792><s%> and make known <S%H3046><s%> to me its interpretation, <S%H6591><s%> you shall be clothed <S%H3848><s%> with purple, <S%H711><s%> and have a chain <S%H2002><s%> of gold <S%H1722><s%> about <S%H5922><s%> your neck, <S%H6676><s%> and shall be the third <S%H8531><s%> ruler <S%H7981><s%> in the kingdom. <S%H4437><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> answered <S%H6032><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> Let your gifts <S%H4978><s%> be <S%H1934><s%> to yourself, <S%H3052><s%> and give your rewards <S%H5023><s%> to another; <S%H321><s%> nevertheless <S%H1297><s%> I will read <S%H7123><s%> the writing <S%H3792><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> and make known <S%H3046><s%> to him the interpretation. <S%H6591><s%>

You, <S%H607><s%> king, <S%H4430><s%> the Most High <S%H5943><s%> God <S%H426><s%> gave <S%H3052><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> your father <S%H2><s%> the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and greatness, <S%H7238><s%> and glory, <S%H3367><s%> and majesty: <S%H1923><s%>

and because <S%H4481><s%> of the greatness <S%H7238><s%> that he gave <S%H3052><s%> him, <S%H3606><s%> all the peoples, <S%H5972><s%> nations, <S%H524><s%> and languages <S%H3961><s%> trembled <S%H1934><s%> and feared <S%H1763><s%> before <S%H4481><s%> him: <S%H6925><s%> whom he would <S%H1934><s%> he killed, <S%H1934><s%> and whom he would <S%H1934><s%> he kept alive; <S%H1934><s%> and whom he would <S%H1934><s%> he raised up, <S%H1934><s%> and whom he would <S%H1934><s%> he put down. <S%H1934><s%>

But when his heart <S%H3825><s%> was lifted up, <S%H7313><s%> and his spirit <S%H7308><s%> was hardened <S%H8631><s%> so that he dealt proudly, <S%H2103><s%> he was deposed <S%H5182><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> his kingly <S%H4437><s%> throne, <S%H3764><s%> and they took <S%H5709><s%> his glory <S%H3367><s%> from him: <S%H4481><s%>

and he was driven <S%H2957><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the sons <S%H1123><s%> of men, <S%H606><s%> and his heart <S%H3825><s%> was made <S%H7739><s%> like <S%H5974><s%> the animals <S%H2423><s%>', and his dwelling <S%H4070><s%> was with the wild donkeys; <S%H6167><s%> he was fed <S%H2939><s%> with grass <S%H6211><s%> like oxen, <S%H8450><s%> and his body <S%H1655><s%> was wet <S%H6647><s%> with the dew <S%H2920><s%> of the sky; <S%H8065><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> he knew <S%H3046><s%> that the Most High <S%H5943><s%> God <S%H426><s%> rules <S%H7990><s%> in the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> of men, <S%H606><s%> and that he sets <S%H6966><s%> up over <S%H5922><s%> it whomever <S%H4479><s%> he will. <S%H6634><s%>

You, <S%H607><s%> his son, <S%H1247><s%> Belshazzar, <S%H1113><s%> have not <S%H3809><s%> humbled <S%H8214><s%> your heart, <S%H3825><s%> though <S%H6903><s%> you knew <S%H3046><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> this, <S%H1836><s%>

but have lifted up <S%H7313><s%> yourself against <S%H5922><s%> the Lord <S%H4756><s%> of heaven; <S%H8065><s%> and they have brought <S%H858><s%> the vessels <S%H3984><s%> of his house <S%H1005><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> you, <S%H607><s%> and you and your lords, <S%H7261><s%> your wives <S%H7695><s%> and your concubines, <S%H3904><s%> have drunk <S%H8355><s%> wine <S%H2562><s%> from them; <S%H7624><s%> and you have praised the gods <S%H426><s%> of silver <S%H3702><s%> and gold, <S%H1722><s%> of brass, <S%H5174><s%> iron, <S%H6523><s%> wood, <S%H636><s%> and stone, <S%H69><s%> which don't <S%H3809><s%> see, <S%H2370><s%> nor <S%H3809><s%> hear, <S%H8086><s%> nor <S%H3809><s%> know; <S%H3046><s%> and the God <S%H426><s%> in whose hand <S%H3028><s%> your breath <S%H5396><s%> is, <S%H3606><s%> and whose are all your ways, <S%H735><s%> you have not <S%H3809><s%> glorified. <S%H1922><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> was the part <S%H6447><s%> of the hand <S%H3028><s%> sent <S%H7972><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> before him, <S%H6925><s%> and this <S%H1836><s%> writing <S%H3792><s%> was inscribed. <S%H7560><s%>
This <S%H1836><s%> is the writing <S%H3792><s%> that was inscribed: <S%H7560><s%> MENE, <S%H4484><s%> MENE, <S%H4484><s%> TEKEL, <S%H8625><s%> UPHARSIN. <S%H6537><s%>

This <S%H1836><s%> is the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the thing: <S%H4406><s%> MENE; <S%H4484><s%> God <S%H426><s%> has numbered <S%H4483><s%> your kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and brought it to an end; <S%H8000><s%>
TEKEL; <S%H8625><s%> you are weighed <S%H8625><s%> in the balances, <S%H3977><s%> and are found <S%H7912><s%> wanting. <S%H2627><s%>
PERES; <S%H6537><s%> your kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is divided, <S%H6537><s%> and given <S%H3052><s%> to the Medes <S%H4076><s%> and Persians. <S%H6540><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> commanded <S%H560><s%> Belshazzar, <S%H1113><s%> and they clothed <S%H3848><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> with purple, <S%H711><s%> and put a chain <S%H2002><s%> of gold <S%H1722><s%> about <S%H5922><s%> his neck, <S%H6676><s%> and made proclamation <S%H3745><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> him, <S%H1934><s%> that he should be the third <S%H8531><s%> ruler <S%H7990><s%> in the kingdom. <S%H4437><s%>
In that night <S%H3916><s%> Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> the Chaldean <S%H3779><s%> King <S%H4430><s%> was slain. <S%H6992><s%>
Darius <S%H1868><s%> the Mede <S%H4077><s%> received <S%H6902><s%> the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> being about sixty <S%H8361><s%> - two <S%H8648><s%> years <S%H8140><s%> old. <S%H1247><s%>
